One day, out of blue, the device crashed -- it turns on, but displays nothing but white blank screen with few dark lines and blots.  It becomes useless less than 1/2 year.... I guess you get what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: zee pad
Reviews.Author: beata
Reviews.Content: Horrible product, very slow and stalls. I would not resonant it. You can spend $100 more and get a better product. I wanted to save a few dollars. I guess you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Zeepad with dual camera, great
Reviews.Author: sue griesmyer
Reviews.Content: I bought my first zeepad in June, as a birthday gift for my 8 yr.old granddaughter,she loves it. It was perfect except it only had the front facing camera, this one has both camera's front and back facing and is great. I think for the price you can't go wrong. I probably will be purchasing a couple more as gifts.

Reviews.Title: good at first
Reviews.Author: dana
Reviews.Content: It was working amazing at first now it is very slow and often closes down my apps and occasionally completely shuts itself off.

Reviews.Title: whew finally my samsung chromebook and Sasmsung galaxy tablet are free from the messy hands
Reviews.Author: Incognito
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the kids. Took sometime to get used to it and figure it out ,but once the kids knew that it does all that the Galaxy do and its theirs ...they are in love. Very handy when they travelled. Small little piece but with price you cant go wrong .Airplane mode was a bit dodgy

Reviews.Title: gift for a college student
Reviews.Author: Juan Marquez
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for our niece that is going to college. she absolutely loves it. she purchased an additional case with built in keyboard and has become a very practical tool for her.

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: mawmaw
Reviews.Content: Its alright A little slow My granddaughter uses it. Not for any major use. Why do I have to have a limit on my words.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my twins
Reviews.Author: Debra Williams
Reviews.Content: it does everything it needs to for my 7 yr old twins. Very easy to operate and very durable. They love it.. Would only recommend for children

Reviews.Title: My zeepad
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is everything I expected and more.The price was great and it is so pretty. Wifi is great too

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The zeepad isn't bad for a 3yr old but the only problem for us is that is too FRAGILE and it takes a bit of TIME for it to think some times it froze when we was downloading apps. HONESTLY if ur child isn't delicate with things I don't recommend it my daughters broke in 1week nd it has no guarantee on it!!

Reviews.Title: upset with the product quality
Reviews.Author: sarah mogu
Reviews.Content: all of them broke within 1 month of buying the product. The charger broke it was a waste of money. I tried to contact them they will not refund back the money or take back their product because it is worthless keeping.

Reviews.Title: what you shuld know!!
Reviews.Author: Christina Bosworth
Reviews.Content: I have had problems with this tablet since I received it.It constantly freezes, I had to send i back to replace it because the screen went out 3 weeks after receiving it. and now the touch sincere is not working am returning and buying from another company.

Reviews.Title: its a great item...
Reviews.Author: Julia Warner
Reviews.Content: I had purchased it to use in my business for my card reader.. but the operating system isn't capable, over all a good purchase

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: AllLOSER -- the screen was lifted from the bezel had to return it.
Reviews.Author: Christian Glahn
Reviews.Content: So far I've not been able to use an Allwinner tablet enough to like or hate it.  I'll wait to see if I EVER get the second unit that I returned and was supposed to come back to me.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and great project
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Zeepad on a Friday and received it on Tuesday. The product was exactly what it said it would be. It was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: FeFe
Reviews.Content: 7" Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB RAM, Multiple Touch Capactive screen, WIFI, Camera, Skype Video Calling, Netflix Movies. I love everything about this tablet, it has everything I need and in my favorite color. Perfect size for me.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Valerie Kleespies "dog lover"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Zeepad from another company and it was not good quality. So I purchased one from goodios and it works perfectly I am so glad I purchased a different one. Easy to use and my niece loves that it had some games already on it.

Reviews.Title: Rating
Reviews.Author: Liselle StLouis
Reviews.Content: It is very slow and it is not useful. It constantly freezes up and the batteries dies very fast. Don't buy this item because its a sell off

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Thomas B.
Reviews.Content: Apps loaded well great speed small in size, the only problem i had was that the built in speaker didnt work, I still want the product, just one that works completly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Little Man , 6 yrs old, and he loves it. Can do everything on it that he loves. Has game apps and netflix. Works great.The only drawback is the battery life. It last about 2 hours. But with a USB charger for the car it is great to take on the road.I am wanting to get one for myself. This is a great tablet and the price makes it even better!

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I have been so proud of my pad. It has really been my company since my surgery. Better than if I had an ipad. Way less expensive with so many features!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: I had to buy a new one becuse my old one fell down the basement stairs the screen didn't crack nothing broke but the power button what I find odd is when I got my new one it came with the USB cord and a good charger but my old one just came with a USB cord that plugs in to a wall charger I only baought the one that broke three months ago before buying a new one with the old one I chould only charge it with a USB cord that connects to a wall charger and the USB port was starting to become worn out so they must have changed it were they send you a good charger and the USB cord separately with the pad I love the new one and its small enough to put in my cargo pants side pocket iam thinking about buying one for my brother seeing how its durable to a limit it whould be great for a kids first tablet I think I'll be more carefull with the new one lol

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: Traci Shell
Reviews.Content: The reason I only gave it 3 stars is because first it's always freezing up and it doesn't have a place for a USB. Secondly the charge doesn't last long I can have it on the charger all night and as soon as I start using it it's down too 50% . I need it for school and with all the malfunctions I am lucky too get my work turned in.

Reviews.Title: Don't do it!
Reviews.Author: Pamela sweetheart
Reviews.Content: This tablet stopped working a month after I purchased it. I didn't realize it was being shipped from China. The seller offered to replace it if I sent it back. It's not worth it as shipping to China is expensive. So I've taken a loss...I have a tablet that doesn't work, and I'm out of the money I paid for it. Very sad.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Alice
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 11 year old girl for her graduation gift. It is just ideal for her, like the fact that I can put pass code to limit the apps that can be downloaded. This gift is perfect for her everyday use around friends.

Reviews.Title: great 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: joant
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for our grandson who has aspergers. He is 7 and is into computers.  He was really excited when he received the tablet.  There was a learning curve since this was our first tablet.  I contacted the seller and they sent back an e-mail with their phone number.  They were very helpful.  It is amazing what this tablet can do. Setting up wifi was easy. I wound up buying 2 more.  This is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Grand kids
Reviews.Author: Grand kids
Reviews.Content: This was a good tablet for the money! I will purchase this company again. My Grandson lives it he takes it everywhere and it picks up as good as a lap top.

Reviews.Title: Great product for thevprice!
Reviews.Author: MTBillups
Reviews.Content: I ordered several of these for my children and I am very pleased with all of them.  Does just what was promised

Reviews.Title: My new best friend, lol!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: When it comes to this product I really love this product. Not only can I get online, as well as play games, it has also allowed me have all the capabilities I had wit my laptop but now I'm able to place my zeepad in my pursue. What I like/dislike about the zeepad is the programs they said comes on it doesn't, however, you can go to the Play Store and set the zeepad up to your heart contents. I also advise against the  suggestion when looking for a case with a keybroard. Having being one of people and the suggesstion was wrong, if one does purchase the zeeppad I  recommend you search for a keybroard case with micro attachment. Hope yours bring you as much joy as mine has.

Reviews.Title: Has a mind of it's own
Reviews.Author: chelene
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my fiancé so that we could skype, but it wouldn't hang up and the sound was horrible. It also took forever to download anything. We had to do factory resets a lot.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: Cj
Reviews.Content: Is this tablet just for kids I'm 21 and want one but I don't want one for a kid will somebody please let me know?

Reviews.Title: Not Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: Utah Diva
Reviews.Content: Between my sister & I we bought 6 of these tablets for our kids for christmas, 6 months later all of them have broke 1 way or another.Two of them the power button pushed in & never popped back out after only a couple of months, which made it difficult to play on the tablet, they had to plug it into a wall to have it light up to swipe it open to play on it, then after a week or so of that, that seemed to stop working & the tablet became worthless.Another 1 got dropped from the arm of a couch to the carpet, that foot & a half drop cracked the screen & broke for good, 2 other ones also got cracked screens easier than should of, by little things like one was laying on the floor & my 12 year old stepped by it, the only thing that touched the tablet was his big toe, that alone cracked the screen & the tablet was useless, so out of the 6 we bought we're down to only 1 more that still works, I wonder how long it will last.We also have Nooks & I have a samsung galaxy, my tablet has been dropped, sat on, etc & is still in perfect conditionDon't buy these tablets if you want them to last loger than 2 months . . .  Oh & Did I mention all the tablets had to be set back to factory settings atleast once because they stopped doing anything

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: San-Alva "Always go with the best- investigat...
Reviews.Content: Tablet works great. Not really a lot to say. Apps run seamlessly and little to no hiccups. Google Play compatibility is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Ok for kids
Reviews.Author: Ochoa
Reviews.Content: This tablet is good a little slow but for the kids it's perfect. Can't expect better for that price,even though I bought 3 and had to return 2 already 1 because it was used and the other because it stop working 20 days after receiving it.

Reviews.Title: amazing tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet as a gift, and I was so excited! This is a great tablet and really fun to use! The only thing I didn't like about it was two things.1. the battery runs out to fast2. two apps of mine don't work no matter whatOther than these reasons I like this tablet a lot and I think that anyone would like it too!

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY. You WILL regret it.
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: Had the item for a little over 5 months and now it does not work.  I saw the negative reviews but like an idiot, I figured it wouldnt happen to me.  NONE of my apps work (even then the ones i paid for).  The color is crap.  Dont sit in the light while using it because all you will get is a glare on the screen.  I got this for my son who loves temple run, even he didnt want to play it.  You get what you pay for.  Never again.  A very poor investment.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Patricia Sarju
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for someone. The specs indicated that this had a front and back camera...even the pictures show this. Delivery time was good....but product has only ONE Camera (on the screen section ) and not back and front as advertised. As to how it works....can't say as yet. I will have to wait for a feed back re that.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Rosetta Anderson "Rosetta Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I bought the zeepad for my grand-daughter who is 6 years old.  She loves it.  It locked up one time and I couldn't get it to turn off or anything.  My husband finally held down the power button until it turned off.  Overall, its a great product.  The downside is it takes a long time to charge up, but she usually does it overnight anyway.  You can download lots of games on it.  She has downloaded temple run I & II.  I am happy with this purchase.  My brother had bought her the meep pad and it didn't last 4 months.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Forquetta Cooper
Reviews.Content: We got it for my son he loves his tablet he never put it down yet . And for my comment before disregard it. My son love playing the free games from the Android market and it's very kid friendly. Very happy mom.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kimica Reynolds
Reviews.Content: This product does exactly what it says. I bought it for my mom who isnt tech savy. She really enjoys it. This product is great for a person who is just getting started. Dont expect it to be like the i pad. Its also a great start for a child. Its great price wise also. Overrall its great.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Marishka More
Reviews.Content: I like it but sometimes stops when using it. For the rest it works all right. I am satisfied with my purchase. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jetonz
Reviews.Content: To Lagy freezes to much waste of money the display is horrible also the gets scratch so easy.........................................fgjoffidiztyssdyufcxxxggfccghj bugged chick. Cugfigffyictghcgjufguxhxghvjhcyvn b vcv

Reviews.Title: No thank you.
Reviews.Author: Meagan Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before buying this tablet.  I expected to get what I paid for.  What I got was less then 1 month of usage before it just wouldn't work at all.  It was a gift for my son and since I ordered it ahead of time, the return date was his actual birthday.  I was hesitant to buy electronics on amazon and now I have learned my lesson.  :(

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: JoAnna I Nishimura
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9yr old son because he was constantly using my phone to go on the internet. The product has held up to the constant usage and great for netflix and games for a child his age. Only down fall is the speed, but Im not to worried about that because other than that it works great for media and social purposes. The price is great for the product

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Not at all happy with the product.  I tried to call customer service and all I got was an answering machine.  It has been on charge for 2 hours and still does not work!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Meg C.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this for my daughters birthday (7) knowing nothing about tablets and was really pleasntly surprised. I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. The size is going to be perfect for her and the price you cant beat. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Reviews.Title: I did not receive ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I just got the tab in teh mail yesterday and have yet to figure out how good it is, but I am disappointed that i did not receive the ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector that was promised.Will update ASAP

Reviews.Title: Inferior Screen quality but the price isn't that high
Reviews.Author: Himanshu Anand
Reviews.Content: i got a device with a faulty screen and I returned it but irrespective of that the device was inferior in quality in its screen and speed as well. I tried installing the groupon app on it multiple times but it just won't work. The touch sensitivity wasn't great too. It is a cheap device but I decided to pay more and get kindle fire HD after working with this for couple of hours.

Reviews.Title: 57donn
Reviews.Author: Donn "Donn"
Reviews.Content: This item was just right for the person it was ordered for, I ordered it for my 13 yr. old granddaughter and she loved it.

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: Mirna
Reviews.Content: Its good for downloading apps, but the reason i give it 4 stars is because sometimes it just freezes. Its an okay product

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Lana Lee
Reviews.Content: Is does all the things it said it could do.  It had enough 4 GB capacity to do just about anything.  Love the portability of the Zeepad, screen size, Skype capabilities and Netflix movies.  Would be a great gift for a teen in high school or for anything that you can imagines.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted less than a month
Reviews.Author: ldb3
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 7 year old daughter. It was a good tablet for a 7 year old. Able to download apps, upload her favorite music, watch her cartoons. Till one day the screen just popped off and once I snapped it back on it just wouldn't turn back on. Returned it back to Amazon, no exchange just refund. Ordered another one and again the screen popped off and snapped it back on and would't turn back on. Returning the second one today. Will pay a little extra and get a Kindle Fire. When it works I would give it Four and half stars, but poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: S. Edmundson
Reviews.Content: It is a great size, made well. But the android system locks up quite a bit. The touchscreen freezes at times. But I suppose for the cost, it's good.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: ryan alton
Reviews.Content: i bought the zeepad for my daughter for her 6th birthday and she loves it! the touch screen is great however there is a delay sometimes but nothing that seems like a big deal. The company that shipped it was right on time. All in all its a terrific gift.

Reviews.Title: slow  to touchy w/ stylist too  short battery life  when strowing it enlarges way to easy  maybe 10yrs will like it
Reviews.Author: nadeen j puczylowski
Reviews.Content: it's a nice pink.  the stylist needs a home  it was for fun but to much time to get anywhere

Reviews.Title: Can't complain for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Atwood
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap tablet so for the price it is good.The things I didn't like was that the volume is very weak, and it is very slow with loading. also sometimes i thought the screen wasn't sensitive enough and i had to push harder...which often messed up my typing. Also I often could not load movies.Otherwise I think it's a pretty ok tablet

Reviews.Title: really like this
Reviews.Author: Tiffany M.
Reviews.Content: I really Like the Zeepad. It works really well for me so far. oniy gripe I have is the battery life wish it stayed on longer through out the day. also brought a case with a keyboard so I use it to type reports and take notes in class. Good product overall.

Reviews.Title: fraud
Reviews.Author: wade
Reviews.Content: This item arrived on time and has everything as listed except the post stated it was 7" it very far from that size was very disappointed in that cause i was expecting 7 inches tablet!!!

Reviews.Title: Where Do I Start
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: When my pavkage arrive the screen wasn't all the way close. The 2 charges that was sent would not charge my son tablet. I tried contacting the seller twice no responds. The tablet would not come on had to open the tablet to find out everything was taped down and the tape on the video card was loose.  The reason why my son's tablet wouldn't come on. If I could do it over I would just go to HHGreg or somewhere and get what I paid for

Reviews.Title: THE TABLET HAVE A LOCK CODE DAT WANT RESET I TRIED EVERYTHIN
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: I FEEL LYKE DIS IS A RIPOFF I BOUGHT DIS FOR A GIFT AND HAVNT USED IT BT ONCE ITS NT WORTH MY MONEY

Reviews.Title: Two out of Three broke in less than Three Months and NO support
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Holland Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids for Christmas - seemed like a cheap alternative to see if they would like this type of thing.They worked great at first, but within a week one charger burned out, then another so they were sharing the third charger or using the alternate usb charging.Then 2 of the 3 stopped taking a charge all together.  Terrible construction on this product.And the service was worse - they first offered to sell me 2 new chargers at the same price I could just order them from amazon and then offered to fix the pads IF I paid for the fix because it was past 30 days - shortest warrantee I ever heard of...Do yourself a favor and splurge for the ASUS or Nexus right out of the gate.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I wanted something for my grand daughter that she would enjoy it is being return it only stays on for a maxium of 45 min even fully charged..

Reviews.Title: good service
Reviews.Author: abdur mohammed
Reviews.Content: i like the product and service i got from this seller. the product works good with little problem and i think the product is a good product and i would rate this product as a good product

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: _star_aitana
Reviews.Content: I ordered this a few days ago and it got it in a short time.. I love it, and its a nice little tablet.. I wanted to have one for myself, and I got the hand of it in no time. Since i am a Apple product user, I thought it might be hard to learn Android, but it's a peace of cake.. I gave it five stars because, It came fast and it's really good... :)

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13......
Reviews.Author: CHARLES WILLIAMS
Reviews.Content: I am in the Middle East at the moment, the kids said they love them and asks that I should some for their friends, it helps to keep them busy and explore new things as well.They loved to have that, they are happy and am okay with it.

Reviews.Title: Does the job nicely.
Reviews.Author: Danger
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter.  Seems to work well and is cheaper than an ipod touch.There are plenty of apps and it seems to work well, other than the battery life is about 3-4 hours.It's screen is lower resolution than the iphone 5 or ipad 3,  but it's perfectly fine for her usage.  I don't want her on the internet or doing e-mail or facebook yet!*** Update,  after not using the device for a week and attempting to boot the device,  it never got past the post screen.  I even tried entering Android diagnostic mode and couldn't get it going.  So I've returned it to the manufacturer for a refund.  I guess you get what you pay for and the fact that nexus 7 and galaxy tab 2's are only $50 more these days,  I was taught a lesson in not skimping on the kids ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids
Reviews.Author: Happy customer
Reviews.Content: The zeepad tablet works great, my kids love it, they enjoy playing angry birds and other preloaded games.I can check my email, facebook and use skype to talk to my mom. It really works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 11yr son who loves "screens", and as a trial for owning this type of electronic. If he took care of this, we would move up to something like an iPad.  I decided to play with it first and perhaps add a few apps and music.  All went well until I got hooked on playing Angry Bird.  During my many nights of playing Angry Bird, the screen began to freeze.  I had to hit the power button once to turn it off (but not shut down) and then back on again in order to continue my game.  I certainly decided to NOT buy this for myself, but he seemed to enjoy it and worked around that problem.  He even watched Netflix movies and YouTube videos on it.  I'm not sure it he still had problems with it freezing.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sherell Hill
Reviews.Content: Very great buy! I had an issue with it and sent it back to the manufacturer. They sent a new one back and its been awesome since then. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: it works but is a bit slow .....roku is a better buy thans this,UNLESS you want it to be portable

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product!
Reviews.Author: T. Hill
Reviews.Content: Received this tablet on time. It is responsive and easy to use. I would recommend it if you are seeking an inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pamala W. Gambrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my tech savvy 3 year old nephew. He LOVE it! When he has this Zeepad in his hands, he doesn't tear up the house.

Reviews.Title: I paid for what???
Reviews.Author: Melissa Ryoppy
Reviews.Content: The first day we had the tablet it worked great.  My nine year old was in love, she finally had her own tablet.  After the first day, apps kept dissappearing.  All of the apps it came pre-loaded with are now gone.... in cyber space somewhere.  We have a very nice tower, yet my daughter cannot get wi-fi in her bedroom 20 ft away.  No netflix, no youtube, no angry birds....  Very dissappointed

Reviews.Title: does even work

Reviews.Title: great product!

Reviews.Content: Bought this for myself and love it! It works perfectly, no cliches..delays..nothing! I wanted a tablet that I could do the basics on (games, Facebook emails)

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: K Henderson
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter and we love it. The graphics are good and it's just the right size for her. My husband played with it the first night and wanted one for himself.

Reviews.Title: No problem

Reviews.Content: no have any problem with this product, only the charger model is not appropriate for the tablet, the product need other input to load better. I compared this tablet model with Zeepad 7.0 multi-touch in black color.

Reviews.Title: muy buen producto

Reviews.Content: Excelente, llego antes de la fecha prevista, y el producto es muy bueno cumple con mis expectativas, me siento muy cómoda con esta pastilla

Reviews.Title: tablet

Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. I enjoy the games and the portable of it. It is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: awsome

Reviews.Content: very satisfy . good tablet for kids I would definately recommend this to anyone...oh and I love the one year warranty. .

Reviews.Title: sucked
Reviews.Author: Alissa
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these tablets in Dec and already 2 don't work. From the beginning none of them would let a phone download pics.  The picture sucks irs blurry on all of them..  never again

Reviews.Title: Works great.Great seller.
Reviews.Author: Robert Anderson
Reviews.Content: I have it hooked up to my wifi and it is a bit slow.  Maybe because my girlfriend synced it with my cell phone apps.  Great for browsing.

Reviews.Title: highly recommend this tablet.
Reviews.Author: tablet user
Reviews.Content: It exceeded my expectations. No problem accessing google play store, amazon app store, and others. (I have seen other tablets not recognized by google store.) When I opened the box, I was surprised to find a short adapter cable that is micro-USB end to regular-USB-female end, which is useful for two things. I can watch movies on a USB memory stick just by plugging it in using this adapter, or I can connect to a carrying case with a USB kepboard. I do both (not at the same time), and they work beautifully. It also came with a very nice stylus and all the other usual stuff. Best 7" tablet under $100 I have seen.

Reviews.Title: do not waste money.
Reviews.Author: shell
Reviews.Content: these are very cheap! I bought 5 and all them had problems within two weeks.1 came in broke,still waiting for its return.Takes forever to get here.Although the company says can return,you have to pay for shipping back then they will refund you with a copy of the receipt. The charging ports get loose and they are slow.with any wi-fi. I would not get,spend a little more for something better.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Becky Porter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item as a gift for my kids thinking it would be a great starter tablet.  Once we received the item, I was very happy with how easy it was to start using and the speed of the apps, specifically Netflix, as my kids watch their favorite shows on it.  And then it went downhill.  I had this product LESS THAN ONE WEEK when it completely stopped working. We used it to watch a movie on Netflix one evening.  I turned it off after using it and we went to bed.  The next afternoon, I attempted to turn it on so we could watch a movie since it was raining.  And nothing.  Would not turn on. I tried charging the tablet and nothing worked.  Needless to say, I was less than pleased.  What pushed me over the dissatisfaction edge is that when returning this item, I had to pay for return shipping; that shipping (since it is international) costs me $26.  So not only am I currently out the money I spent on the item, I am now out an extra $26 because I was sent a defective product.  I can understand if I wanted to return this product for my own simple reason paying the shipping. But when this product was defective and lasted less than one week after I received it, making me pay the return shipping is not the way to keep me as a customer.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Have an ongoing problem with using the charger.  Have to wiggle the plug around to get it to charge.  Other than that, the tablet is a pretty good item.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, and a few other games pre-loaded which was nice. I was also able to download various apps from the Google PlayStore with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Took awhile, but its good
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Took about a week longer than they said and it practically was bare bones, no games or apps on it like the first one I ordered. But it wasn't a problem since I still had the history of my Google store from my other one. I simply downloaded the apps and its working fine. Power button does have the tendency to get depressed into the case sometimes though and is a pain to take apart and pull it out, but overall happy with the device.

Easy to use as well, thinking of getting 2 more for my kids.The price isnt bad but my boys are 4 and 6 and dont want to spend that much on it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AND EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "BiloxiGal"
Reviews.Content: I got this for limited use while traveling back and forth to work on public transportation. I use it as an ebook reader more than anything.  It's exactly what I wanted.  I tried the least expensive Kindle, and found I just couldn't live with no color on the screen. I can download my ebooks from Amazon using the wi-fi at home with no problems.  The wi-fi setup didn't take any time at all.  The cost of the tablet is such that if I lose it or it disappears while taking it back and forth, I won't feel too bad.  I can also check my email once I get to work on a nearby open wi-fi network if I want to.  I installed a 16 gig sd card on it with some music files yesterday, but haven't tried it yet.  However, the transfer was a breeze.  My computer recognized the tablet, and the tablet showed the USB symbol that let me use it as another drive.I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Deion
Reviews.Content: i got scrathed really easily but it was good and it also legged aloti couldnt play bike race and stuff like that

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: First of all it came straight from China and took almost a month to arrive. I bought it for my 14 year old daughter who is very tecno savvy more so than I. It worked for one day then half the screen stopped working and the image wouldn't rotate when you moved the tablet up and down. I shipped it back and it cost me 28 dollars to do so. Still haven't heard any confirmation on whether they have revived it yet and still no refund for the tablet or the shipping cost. Learn from my mistake and stay clear of this product and spend the little extra for a quality Android.

Kids love it and haven't put it down since it arrived. It does everything it said it would and they love the color. I am planning on ordering another for the kids and one for myself!!!

Reviews.Content: It met my standards. Just wish it had Bluetooth and a backside camera. The battery life was a disappointment, after on a few moments of movie watching it had died.

Reviews.Title: Better Then IPad if you just what something small.

Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife that is not a techie. She has a I phone a uses it but her Nook was first gen. This works like a good e-reader, Facebook, and Pandora tablet.

Reviews.Title: Its actually not bad.
Reviews.Author: Arnie Posadas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmas 1 year old nephew and I had the chance to test it out first and install things before letting the baby handle it. It is pretty responsive for its price and it even got most of the common things that are available in most products like camera, wifi, OTG cable. Although this one did not come with bluetooth, probably for the cost. I was planning to use a bluetooth speakers because although this device comes with speakers..... the sound is really low when trying to play a lullaby song.Overall, you get what you paid for and for this one, I think we got more than what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: Barely adequate...

Reviews.Content: I knew at $65 that I was pushing it but this tablet is very buggy. I have a permanent pink line to the left of center screen and it has lots of issues...That being said...useful for travel...but that's about it...

Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife a week before Christmas, the price was awesome.  I recieved it on Christmas Eve, just in time for Christmas morning.  And my wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet

Although I cannot find a way yet to use the keyboard I bought with this tablet.Please I really need help finding out how I can set the blue tooth up on the tablet if this this is the only way to make it work.Thank you.

It doesn't sync properly with google.  The headphone jack is sensitive in order to get both sides to work.  It's less than 1/2 of the price of a kindle and 1/4 of the price of an iPad mini.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Discret product

Reviews.Content: The tlablet is good. It has not connectio 3G, but is so good for read, and play some games. It is slowly, but It has all what you need for watch videos and some page web.

Reviews.Title: works good, shiped within time

Reviews.Content: iv had this product for about 2 weeks its worked great, it shipped in a timely manner. i would recommend this product to someone looking for a good low priced tablet. orderd a micro sd and case.

Reviews.Title: THis is a great little pad
Reviews.Author: Carol "Mother of 3 rugrats"
Reviews.Content: Does what i need it to do...much cheaper than Kindle that kids broke LCD screen...at this price i could buy 4 Kindle fires.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: I am amazed!
Reviews.Author: N. Bolser
Reviews.Content: It works! and works well.  I have almost no experience with tablets, really have no idea what I'd do with one, but for the price, I figured I'd find out what its good for.  Still working on that part, but this little device is way more than I'd expected.  I nearly sent it back, could not get it to connect up to my wireless at home.  Took it into a local shop and asked nicely if he could get it to connect.  There it was.  Went home, reset the router and the Zeepad immediately connected.  It was me, not the Zeepad.  Off to the Google Play Store...A month later.  I still very much like this little tablet.  Had a terrible time connecting it to the computer by USB, but finally figured out that an option to "debug the USB connection" was checked off.  Sounds like a good thing to do whatever it is, but it stopped the USB connection.  Unchecked it, and bang, it was connected.Haven't found any apps it would not run, mostly games.  Battery life isn't great, but it uses the same micro USB as the cell phones we have, so finding a charger and cable is no problem around the house.  Added a 16 GB memory chip, so the Zeepad is loaded with videos, talking books, epub books, and handles all well.  It did not like the high resolution videos, so ran those through Format Factory to knock down the resolution and shrink the size.  Very watchable.

Reviews.Title: rosmary

Reviews.Title: IAM SO GLAD MY FRIEND TOLD ME ABOUT THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Content: IT VERY EASY TO USE MY SON LOVES IT..  IT IS SMALL ENOUGH I CARRY IT IN MY PURSE WHEN HE DONE PLAYING IT .  THE ONLY THING IS I WISH THE BATTERY LIFE LASTED LONGER..

Reviews.Title: Cute little Zeepad gadget!
Reviews.Author: Jannie Annie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a reader for my granddaughter. I decided to test it out before giving it to her. I have to say I am quite impressed with it. It worked great right out of the box. I followed the directions and charged it 2 1/2 hours before using it. It is so cute in pink. The graphics are nice and the speed is good. It has some handy pre-loaded aps such as Facebook, Google and fun games I know she will like such as Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja. It is so much more than a reader. I've only had it a couple of days and it has an ap for the reader but I haven't had time to test that yet. It completes with much more expensive tablets so I have to say so far I'm very happy with this purchase and you certainly get much more than your monies worth!!!!

Reviews.Title: My 9 year old  grandson love it
Reviews.Author: correy bradley
Reviews.Content: No problem easy to operate n downloads it came in excellent condition and I will purchase another one in the near futre

Reviews.Title: Best for games, not for internet surfing
Reviews.Author: Pete Sakes
Reviews.Content: My Android cellphone with budget service (Boost) has an easier time loading webpages than the zeepad running off of wifi.I bought this for my daughter, however, and it is for her to download and play android app games, not surf the web, and it is great for playing games. I have had a few freezes, but only while trying to visit webpages, none yet during game play. I will update if anything goes completely kablooey with it. I'm pleased with what I paid for it, as it works for its intended purpose. Had I bought it for personal use, I would be very, very disappointed. I purchased a GTAB Nero by Matricom for myself and had to return it. It was practically dead on arrival. Now I've purchased a (slightly) more expensive iRULU 9 inch for personal use. I haven't received it yet, so we shall see...

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Content: Great product. The package was received on time. it was brand new in great working condition. my daughter hasnt put it down since I gave it to her. I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Content: The zeepad is just what I was looking for and the price was right. I would recomend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: not bad

and they try to play those games u are at risk I use avg pro its still$15 bucks but I have it installed on 4 devices so worth the money u can get it in the play store this tablet is awesome but an adult should go thru all the settings and run spywear b4 handing it over to kids as I said in my updates whoever rooted the device changed the settings if u run avg it will walk u thru the settings at the end of the scan to protect your deviceI bought this tablet for my 18 month old daughter because she is determined to keep up with her older brothers and loves all the learning apps available for young toddlers I must say this tablet is great for her im going to try to find a kid tuff case of course the tablet is on the cheaper side I only paid 76 bucks im not complaining all the apps work and this tab has options to delete installed apps and options to move apps to sd card I did not have those options on my galaxy so not bad at all shes gonna be so excited to play her word games when she wakes up from naptimeUpdateJust realized this tab comes rooted I know this is a high selling point for some it makes me a little nervous but so far so good I will update again if anything else pops upUpdateSo my daughter loves it the abc phonics games are a must for anyone with young toddlers the zeepad is definatly great so far of course the speakers suck and itscheap plastic its only $76 bucks I recommend going thru the settings whoever rooted it set those kind of weird still tweaking them my daughter doesnt want to let go of the thing its great for kids and budgets I cnt afford an ipad and if I could im not handing It to my child so this is a great way for u to let your youngster play without losing out on $500 or more if they drop itUpdateDay 2 with the zeepad the charger works its battery life definatly isnt great and it depletes even when your not using the tablet but I also believe those small annoyances to be the reason the zeepad is available for such a cheap price its a wonderful beginner tablet for young kids it comes already installed with kids games and is obviously intended for kids but as I said before if your on a budget an adult could find this useful also its not the fastest or the best thats why its so cheap but its still more than enough for my daughter to watch her shows and play her apps I would definatly recommend this tablet to others great purchaseUpdateThe tablet is still working despite the fact my 18 month old has been drooling and pushing on the screen a little harder than I like then again I bought her the zeepad so she wouldnt abuse my galaxy anymore so I guess I shouldnt complain reading the reviews are what helped me make my purchase and they are also how I determine what seller to purchase from that is ehy I keep updating I feel like this tablet is a good deal if u purchase from a reliable seller and supervise your kids charge it for them its not a tank they can still break it make them sit on the couch while they play it instead of running with it this tablet is cheap and has tons of features but its not durable or it would cost more if u want durable spend $100 more bucks and u will get higher quality this is a great beginner tablet its still quite fast for a single core processor and has tons of features runs netflix youtube and my comcast apps all fine on comcast I have to log out then back in somtimes for it to work but for it $76 delivered its not that big of a deal plus u can install apps that require root access my tablet doesnt do that and to buy higher end rooted tablets is at least $100 more on top of what the going price is so im assuming the negative reviews are the people who bought from the seller at the very bottom offering the dual camera on the probably fake zeepadsUpdateIts been a couple weeks now the zeepad is still charging and works great I only charge it about once a week but I also shut it off when my daughter isnt playing it I think this was a great deal my daughter loves it and it plays all her movies and games without any problemsUpdateThe zeepad is still working just got done loading a bunch of free mp3 songs for my daughter off of the free app I got off google play I really dnt understand all the bad ratings for my$76 bucks this is an amazing deal we have 3 samsung galaxy tab2 also and this tablet does just as much a little slower at times and not as good quality but for the price this is a great dealUpdateSkype works and all of the other apps we have loaded on here just got done reading elmo and dora ebooks we downloaded on the kindle app I still cnt figure out why people dnt like this tablet I'm writing my review on it rn the battery isn't that bad and why would u want your child playing 5hrs of games a day anyways either way zeepad still works and we still love it

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD, SELLER DracoTek Please Read
Reviews.Author: Damita J Pannell
Reviews.Content: I had to contact the seller because the shipping address was incorrect. I chatted with Amazon and they sent a request to Draco Tek. I also sent an email to Drack Tek and they responded within 48 hours...I was impress with the seller and Amazon for helping me correct the shipping address. I purchase this item on March 9,2013 I received this item on March 23, 2013 sooner than promised. I brought this product for my grand-daughter she is 4 years old and is very savvy with my iPad 4. I brought this product for the price and for what it can do. I was some what disappointed because when I received this product everything was their except the stylus pen, the box came with 3 different type of chargers. One was USB, AC adapter and one for using a flash drive. The USB and AC Adapter does not work I tried it and the charge stayed at 1%. So I tried a different USB and it started charging so I left it to charge overnight. I tried it the next day and it did not charge more than 2%. The product request that you charge it the first time 6 hours...so I was disappointed that I still could not use this item. So I tried another charger that I had and this charger was charging I started charging at 9:00am and it was fully charged be 2:00pm.  Finally I was able to see what this could do and so far it works okay. I know folks say this was inexpensive...however you should always receive what the seller is selling and the item should do what the product states it should do no exceptions.  I brought this base on what the product offered. Money should not be a factor...just because some items cost more does not make them a better product. I could send this product back after all if the product cannot work because you cannot charge it then it is no good to you...major flaw. I think Drakco Tec Store which is located in China should read their customers reviews. I did read the reviews and had mixed emotions. Being a buyer at Amazon and trusting Amazon I took a chance. I have purchased a lot on Amazon since March 9,2013 and I'm learning a lot about the sellers and shipping. I what have rated this product higher because it does work and it is a good buy...however not being able to charge this item is very huge for me. Please take the time to read all reviews...their was a lot to read. I read all of the reviews after ordering. So I did know there was a possibility that the charger would not work. So I did gather up all of the old chargers I had collected over the years from old cell phones which save the day...so in the end it did work out. I will do a much shorter review after using the product longer.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price especially.
Reviews.Author: David Draper
Reviews.Content: works really well, for the price i am extremely happy. My girls have enjoyed them and they are pretty sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Had To Send Back Already
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and haven't even had it for a week and I get a black screen when I turn it on so I am returning it.  The battery life on this is horrible as well.  I read the reviews and thought that the reviews were ok so I purchased it.  I don't know if I just got a defective one but I'm not going to find out because once I get my refund I will be purchasing something different.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: Yolanda
Reviews.Content: bought this product for my cousin but tested it for abit, the tablet is working ok, not the fastest but ok speed. my one disappointment is that it came with a few scratches.

Reviews.Title: Bad Tab
Reviews.Author: CaliNative
Reviews.Content: This is not a good tablet. It constantly freezes, and deletes the things i have downloaded. I am mad i even baught this, because it is a complete waste of money. half the time it doesnt even really turn on when i want it to, thats how delayed the reactions are!Do NOT buy this.The only thing this is good for is that you get a stylus with it, and at least they couldnt mess that up.You have to buy an external memory card for it( which is good becuase you can have switch memory cards out..)but it constantly deletes my stuff from the app store, and i dont know why.when i received it the packaging was terrible, and i thought that it may have been damaged.I have never seen more spelling mistakes than i have in the manual of how to use this product...its like they didnt even use spell check!!!this sucks, dont be fooled by the price and think this is a steal...

Reviews.Title: good buy for a kid
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for 10 year old and his only complaint was that it takes a second to load when your turning it on, if it has been off

Reviews.Title: SO BEYOND HAPPY with this :) love AMAZON
Reviews.Author: mami montana
Reviews.Content: WOW 1st time I added a review THIS PRODUCT is GREAT!!!I LOVE IT the Touch is sensitive actually WORKS! My son is happyand for the PRICE , I am a HAPPY customer :)BUY this product!! SAVE URSELF MONEY

Reviews.Title: my android
Reviews.Author: Yvonne DiOrazio
Reviews.Content: I am really liking this tablet a lot! I just think that the plug in for power should be on the short side, but people may like it on the longer side, depends how you use it mostly.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Kira
Reviews.Content: I like this tablet for my toddler because its good enough for her, but the battery life is not all that great. the battery charger broke in the first week that we had it, but the usb cord will charge it which i like better any way. i downloaded lots of toddler games and they play great but as far as facebook, youtube, or pintrest its slow and gets stuck often. so if you need an inexpensive tablet to keep your kids off your ipad then this is it! but for adult use for everyday things that an ipad can do this is not it. it just wont hold a charge long enough for wireless stuff. but it came fast, the seller is great and over all my 3 yr old is happy to play with it.

Reviews.Title: wooow!
Reviews.Author: jeffrey
Reviews.Content: These tavlets r just simply amaxing for tge price the screen interface is awesome n no lagg at al I love it for the price thanks an fast shipping withing 3 days I got mine!!!

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: ashlee
Reviews.Content: . I don't know how to find out where to get it fixed. The metal piece inside it where u charge it fell out and now it will not charge so now it's just a paper weight. :( I'm obviously not thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: LSHAW
Reviews.Content: It served is purpose for my 11 yrs old son. He was able to look at Netflix and play his games.

Reviews.Title: 7 inch zeepad
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: I love it just what I wanted!I  can used it every day to read, listen to music and so on!

Reviews.Title: Definitely got what I paid for!
Reviews.Author: MIssMerrMerr
Reviews.Content: I was always told if I have nothing to say, then say nothing.  However, after a very disappointed 10 year I must say this is the worse 90 dollars I have spent.  It arrived on time and after two weeks it is now on its way back.  It doesn't keep a charge,lasting only about 2 hours.  Two weeks later my son goes to turn it on and it won't.  All of a sudden it comes on and it has reset itself and erased everything!  It no longer will connect to wifi.  I contacted te seller and they told me I had to contact amazon.  So I contacted amazon and they told me to contact the seller.  Seriously! Amazon finally sent me a link to return it.  It's now on its way back and I am patiently waiting for the return of my money.

Reviews.Title: Its okay!
Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 10 year old. The tablet does what it is supposed but sometimes have a mind of its own.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Anema
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow at times, definitely not a games tablet, though all angry birds games play just fine. For a simple reader, it's very good. Battery life is very good also, lasts for a week with my use. I've been able to install all the productivity apps that I have on my iPhone, they all work great (with wifi, of course). One note- don't bother trying to get to the website to flash the firmware- the English is so bad it doesn't make any sense!!!!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his birthday. We gave it to him just to find out that it won't work. WiFi says its connected but won't connect to the play store. It won't connect to any pages on the internet. Not happy with it and now we have to purchase another tablet for my son.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: krissyh78
Reviews.Content: These are very durable and great to do about anything.  I bought it as a gift for my 9yr old and he absolutely loves it.  Only downfall is that the battery does not keep a long charge.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Matthew L. Keiser
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 2.5 yr. old.  After downloading some children's aps it didn't take him long to figure how to turn the device on and off and open his games and puzzles.  It is quite durable and has survived a couple of drops to the floor and keeps on going.  The screen resolution is no i pad retina but we're not streaming movies or anything like that.  My wife and I have a few of our own aps as well and we love to use it too.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: FooFoo123
Reviews.Content: I must admit, When I first got this tablet I was VERY IMPRESSED! but after 2 months of use, it no longer would charge and would freeze up ALL THE TIME. Returned and bought a better one with a 8GB.

Reviews.Title: Very good value priced tablet
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Costigan
Reviews.Content: The screen isn't as bright as the Apple or Google tablets (I have both), but functionally it's right there with them.  Very nice tablet for the money.  Great value!

Reviews.Title: Great gift for 7 year old!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this tablet.  We haven't had too much trouble using it with her, save for one app that decided to quit working.  Only real gripe is that the Micro USB port is positioned at the top of the unit.  Meaning you have to drape a connection to a USB keyboard either around the tablet or behind it while it's positioned in a case.  other than that, great!

Reviews.Title: Screen cracked when touching with finger when playing game
Reviews.Author: Vincent Giordano
Reviews.Content: Poor construction broke within 3 months. Glass cracked when playing a game. Not a very good value when it lasted such a short time.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: jenifer hammel
Reviews.Content: i wasted my money on a cheap knock off then i bought the zeepad and i love every thing about it

Reviews.Title: For what it is worth ...
Reviews.Author: Lorane
Reviews.Content: I actually got this Android tablet only for the Google Play store. I have a Kindle Fire and Google Play doesn't work on the Fire. The Amazon store is quite limited. So I use the Zeepad to get apps and then transfer them to the Fire. I really don't use it for anything else. The battery life is quite horrible. I keep it turned off completely and turn it on when I need to. This might be OK for a child to play with or for someone on a limited budget who wanted a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Tonya Gemmer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my grandson for Christmas. He's spent many hours loading and playing games. The graphics are very good and I haven't noticed any lags in switching applications.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Great!
Reviews.Author: Donald Jones
Reviews.Content: This thing is great you can't beat it it does everything I needed and more and for the price, wow!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Starlight's_Sonnet
Reviews.Content: It's a pretty good tablet for its price. I got it for my cousin and he's really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Five star rating for service
Reviews.Author: Randy T Childers
Reviews.Content: The 7" Zeepad was easy to use and set up. It had pre-loaded games on the unit. It also came with a screen protector.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet just because the price was so low.  You definitely get what you paid for in this tablet.  Low graphic quality, and very slow.  I hardly have any apps downloaded and the tablet creeps so slow that it gets to be a pain even trying to do a simple search on the internet.  Also, the battery dies so fast you pretty much have to keep it plugged in to use it.  I would recommend spending a little more to get a higher quality tablet...I wish I would have!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: M. Marcotte
Reviews.Content: Don't bother with this 79.00 doorstop.  I purchased 2 as christmas gifts.  Big mistake.  Returned 1 immediately.  The other got wrapped and given as a gift.  When opened 3 weeks later we decided the capacitive touch screen was worthless and proved it.  Being beyond our 30 day return policy I paid an additional 45.00 for shipping and repair fees to suppusedly have it repaired.  Received it back 2 weeks later in the same condition.  Both units appeared used and screen scratched on initial delivery.  Now I have a 125.00 frisbee (doorstop).  Not to mention the 100.00 worth of my time invested in screwing around with trying to make things right.  Please learn from my mistake.  I have an Asus and a galaxy tablet and love them both.  Spend the money, you get what you pay for in this case.

Reviews.Title: fun
Reviews.Author: melissaellis4224
Reviews.Content: imy son had fun playing this game i realy love it very much and he  plays it alot to thank you

Reviews.Title: zeepad..wont hold up!
Reviews.Author: priska
Reviews.Content: Ok..so I bought this for my fourteen year old and eight year old for Xmas..unfortunatly they didnt even last a couple of weeks..the screens are extremely fragile and they both ended up shattering..I own a kindle fire.my kindle has survived both boys and a three year old and has been dropped numerous occasions and still manages to work perfectly! My opinion is to save your money until you have enough to buy a good tablet.one that will withstand time. Like a kindle or galaxy tablet. Both of those tablets can do exactly what this one did and then some!

Reviews.Title: For the price I guess its OK.
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Hendricks
Reviews.Content: Pro's: Its cheap and screen is very bright at nighttime. Touch sensing seems to work just as well as the top brands. Is already rooted before you receive it so thats a bonus.Con's: Seems to be made with some cheap plastic. Screen is hard to see when its bright outside and you pretty much HAVE to be right in front of it to see it. Doesnt run very fast and does seemed dated. Definitely make sure you get a Micro SD card for this model, cause 4GB just is NOT enough room, especially considering you have slightly less than 2GB available with the OS on it.

Reviews.Title: Very good.Fantastic.
Reviews.Author: R. Clear
Reviews.Content: Price excellent,and work fantastic,my grand...es happy. I will buy soon another one.everything work fine in this product.thanks.Richard.

Reviews.Title: MY LITTLE BABY IS HAPPY WITH IT
Reviews.Author: Romer Garcia
Reviews.Content: IT VERY NICE.THE PRICE IS EXCELENT.IT WORKS LIGHTLY AND POWERFULL.THE BATTERY DESCHARGES TOO FAST BUT IT WORK OK.I LIKE IT VERY MUCH.I LIVE IN VENEZUELA AND MY BABY IS HAPPY WITH IT.

Reviews.Title: Piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: GrandFacilitator
Reviews.Content: Where to start... Shipping took nearly an extra week (seller issue, not the product but I figured it's relevant). The screen was only attached by the ribbon cable and kept falling out. It was gift for a kid on Christmas so we dealt with it. He's only here on the weekend so it didn't get much use and we figured it would be ok. The screen eventually fell out and cracked down the middle. They wanted another $40 to fix it and stated there is no manufacturer warranty for hardware issues, only software. Besides the poor construction it also didn't function very well. One of the main selling points was for him to be able to Skype with family members and it couldn't handle both voice and video at the same time (crappy processor?). We tried from our PC to make sure it wasn't the connection, once we turned off the video option off it functioned ok at best. Terrible terrible product, filed an Amazon dispute.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase this.
Reviews.Author: Camille
Reviews.Content: After having this tablet for less then a week it no longer holds a charge and wont even come on. I'm pissed off because I purchased it specifically to take on a trip with me so I wouldnt have to carry a heavy laptop around and I could read ebooks and use the other features like internet and netflix during my trip. I am extremely dissappointed and I will be returning it. It was a complete waste of money and time. Now my trip is in 4 days and I'm out $100 until I get my refund, and I have no tablet to bring with me to the trip. I could have spent that money on other stuff.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my son
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my son and he is enjoying it. It has all the features and functions that he  wanted.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: zeepad
Reviews.Content: Im more than satisfied with the zeepad it has match my expectations and is just great, i take it everywhere and is always there with me no matter what

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is as I expected. It is my first experience with a tablet and I have nothing to complain. Internet works, the battery lasts long enough, everything is conveniently arranged. It took me some time to realize that you cannot us the device when it is charging.

Reviews.Title: Zeepads 2
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: I have 2 Grandsons that really love to play their ZEEPADS. They have them loaded with their favorite games. They take them with them everywhere they go.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Adams
Reviews.Content: This small pad is easy to use and light weight. My daughter who is 10yrs old enjoys it the most.

Reviews.Title: Good little Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: Patricia Folsom
Reviews.Content: After seeing my Granddaughters that she received for Christmas I thought this would be something to pass time with while on field trips and waiting for the kids. It's not real fast but gets the job done. I just wish the battery would last longer because sitting on a bus you have no way of charging it up. All in all it's a great little pad & my other 2 Granddaughters are getting them for their birthdays.

Reviews.Title: Well
Reviews.Author: celestine butler
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. I got it for my son because he keeps messing on my iPad. This is not a product I would use but it works for him.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: B. Wells
Reviews.Content: Too bad Amazon doesn't allow a zero star rating.  It broke the second time I turned it on, which was really no surprise when I opened the package and saw what was being considered a user's manual.  Here is an excerpt:1. If you long time don't to use this Tablet...Yes, the entire user's manual is written this way.  Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money to get a decent tablet. This one is garbage.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad purchase
Reviews.Author: ranman43072
Reviews.Content: I actually recieved this tablet 2 days earlier than expected which was a good thing becauce it was for my Grandson's Birthday. Well packaged and it worked right out of the box. I did however charge it for 6 hours as suggested from other reviews before setting it up. I have hade no issues what so ever and have recommended this tablet to many friends for the smaller fingers in thier famlies.The price was great for my budget and I will probably buy another one for my youngest Grandson as soon as he is old enough.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Product
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Olson
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this product. I bought two for my granddaughters. One granddaughter locked hers up before we could put anything on it and information I was given from Zeepad did not work to reset the tablet. Just do your homework first before you buy this. Now I have a tablet that no one can use and I was not able to get a replacement. I will never buy from another seller on amazon again if it has to do with electronics. I ended up buying my granddaughter a kindle fire and she just loves it. This product is a loser!

Reviews.Title: Great for my husband!
Reviews.Author: mandy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for valentines for my husband, and he loves his new tablet. This is his first tablet, and he found it easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: It showed only the android screen when I tried to turn it on.  I had to return it.
Reviews.Author: bobbie wortham,
Reviews.Content: Did not meet my expectations,  The instructions were not clear and had bad grammar.  Hard to understand.  It has no comparison to the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: First ever tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Bidlack
Reviews.Content: It does do almost all of what I expected except the camera is terrible.  The tablet surface is like a mirror and there is not eye hole to take picture, so uhless you want pics of yourself it's awful!!!!

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: butler
Reviews.Content: We are happy with this,  but would be happier if the skype video worked. It was for my grandson , it was so he could video skype with his nana. But other than that he likes it and plays on it . The directions need to be a  bolder and larger print for easier reading.Thank YouTerri G Butler

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sharon Johnson
Reviews.Content: I was very upset when I ordered the Zeepad it was supose to come in before Christmas.  It DID NOT arrive untill after Christmas!!!!! It was my son's Christmas present.  If it was not going to be here before Christmas the company should have said it would not arrive in time for Christmas.  I placed the order on December 15, 2012.  On my order it said delivery estimate was December 18 - 21, 2012.  I would have paid extra to get it shipped by Christmas or ordered from somewhere else, but didn't know it would not arrive in time for CHristmas!!! When it did not arrive by December 21 I looked on line and it said it had been shipped.  The postal service told me it looked like they had just made the lable for shipping but it hasn't left company yet.  I tried to contact engine29 and could not. But when I was triying to contact them I saw where they had done the same thing to several other customers.  I emailed the company (because they didn't list a phone number - I wanted to talk to someone personally) and didn't get a responce.  By this time I was really afraid I would not receive the Zeepad, they had taken my money, but saw on Amazon where you prevented that form happening.  I would not recommend this company to anyone.  But as far the Zeepad it is ok for what we wanted.  My 11 year old son uses. it.

Reviews.Title: never could get to work right.Freezing up since day onegiving
Reviews.Author: Faye Powe
Reviews.Content: giving this a low rating because I have never been able to use it.I was told to flash it by downloading the firmware but I am not familiar with that therefore it is still not working.

Reviews.Title: Great deal &easy; to use
Reviews.Author: Justme
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these 7" zeepad for my kids. My daughter is an avid reader so now she can have ebooks. My children are young so I didn't want to spend much. I couldn't believe how impressed I was upon opening the first one today. I have the kindle hd and iPhone and while screen resolution isn't high quality hd it is not bad by any means either when put side by side with my kindle fire hd. Now I'm thinking of getting one for my husband too. It comes with screen protector, stylus, power cord, data transfer cables, and ear buds. Perfect starter for anyone on a budget!! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Lasted one month
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This was a fine inexpensive tablet for a month. Unfortunately the wifi quit working as soon as the return window expired and will not turn on, making the tablet useless. I've done a factory reset and tried getting the wifi to work in several different locations with no success. Trying to turn it one results in a "turning wi-fi on..." message which never goes away and never connects. Would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: great buy...
Reviews.Author: Qadir
Reviews.Content: came very quickly.bought this for my wife to use as an ereader...she loves it...its working very well,no problems so far...cant complain...however wanted to buy one for myself but it went up by $16.

Reviews.Title: rbowers
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: This is suppose to be new I paid for the new one and got a used sratched one that runs slow.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these one black one pink suppose to be new, but they both seem to be used,since the screens are scratched and they run very slow. They are for my children and they cannot understand why they are scratched and neither can I.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 before this one in local stores and neither worked great.  This one is a great deal for kids who want a tablet but parents don't want to spend the money for the more expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Screen is terrible / wireless is not working correct
Reviews.Author: S. H.
Reviews.Content: It took a month to get it in the mail, the screen is not good quality, there a lines that go through the screen. One of my friends purchased this item as well, after a few weeks the charger piece and power button fell out, she was not able to return it. I would rather pay 70 dollars more and get a kindle fire or google android tablet, and don't have to worry about it falling apart.

Reviews.Title: broke, won't charge after 1 month
Reviews.Author: putput
Reviews.Content: Broke after about a month.  The charger that came with it broke right away and then we charged it with a cell phone charger, then it quit charging altogether! JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding item
Reviews.Author: LeRoy Campeau
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this as a gift and my granddaughter loves it. For the money this gift is awesome when it comes to down loading apps and the learning apps help her.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: I bought as a gift for kids ages 5-10 & they seem to like it, so I guess that's all that matters. Took a little longer to arrive but I guess since its coming from overseas then it goes through customs.

Reviews.Title: Price matches Quality
Reviews.Author: Alejandra J "Zen Mind"
Reviews.Content: 79.00 for a tablet computer is pretty cheap.  Sounds good for our 9 year old son.  He had it only for two weeks.  The power button got loose and fell inside.  The screen got slightly scratched.  The screen was hard to see unless in a perfectly lighted room, not too bright.  If your child is not hard on equipment, thre Zeepad may be a great starter computer.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: Perfect gift for a preteen!!  No none issue at this time!  Slighly slow accessing the internet, but great for the age.

Reviews.Title: Dierections
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: The Z pad worked as advertised. You better know what your doing because the directions are totally poor. Written in pidgin English very difficult to read or understand!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Everything works ok. For the price its pretty good. Camera isn't the best but apps work fine. No issues yet. Was for my daughter.  Her first tablet. So its good.

Reviews.Title: This is a nice gadget to have.
Reviews.Author: Amy Lynn "Vampire Fan"
Reviews.Content: I like the ease it offers when taken to different places not being too bulky at all.  Very easy to use and I like playing the "Angry Birds".

Reviews.Title: surprised
Reviews.Author: gryphon2015
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids and for the price I am happy with how well it works.  The only problem I found was the screen size but their eye sight is better than mine. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to get a tablet for their children

Reviews.Title: okay tablet, not great
Reviews.Author: J. Mundy
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting a lot for such a cheap tablet but in some ways I am still disappointed.  My 800mhz phone is noticeably faster than the tablet, apps like pulse will force close constantly, battery life is poor, background processes have to be turned off or you'll wait forever for things to load and the viewing angles are "odd".  It is still usable for emulators and other apps if you are patient enough.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: rural internet user
Reviews.Content: This is the only tablet I have used. I was pleasantly surprised by how good it is. I loaded Opera Mini on it using wifi in town and now use my phone as a wifi hotspot and have the internet on the tablet with Opera Mini speeds. I also loaded a searchable Bible on it with no problem and it works great. This is all I use it for but it is good for my purposes. I live in the boonies and we don't have access to the things they have in town but this works well for me.

Reviews.Title: amazing!!
Reviews.Author: MTLin
Reviews.Content: My wife picked four tablets for Christmas, I picked this one. She absolutely loves it!! She even got our son one after his more expensive one broke five days after receiving it for Christmas! Would recommend for ages four on up!!!

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: CLAUDIA OCHOA
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 9 yrs old daughter for Christmas. I am very impressed it is everything they said it would be. We added a 16gb sd card to it and it helps keep the hard drive quick. We have had it for about a month it runs great and my daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: hmarie
Reviews.Content: It came in on time and was exactly what I expected. Got it for my 8 year old daughter. Perfect...

Reviews.Title: love the zeepad
Reviews.Author: nikie boyd
Reviews.Content: my daughter love this product so much and also love it to and apparently some one else loved it to because a week later it was stolen but I will be replacing it very soon but I love it It deserves ten stars!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Heven
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it... Although Everytime I try to log on Netfilx it won't load, but other than that it's and awesome tablet for her:)

Reviews.Title: good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Product is fair. USB port stopped working 2 days after I received the item. Also shipped with a defective USB cable. Did receive earlier than was stated by the shipper though, so that was a bonus.

Reviews.Title: wont last forever
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 4 year old to keep her off my phone, we downloaded a kid lock app where we could control what she could and couldn't do and she has enjoyed it very much!  Notably slower than my phone, but apps like Angry Birds and Temple Run did not lag at all.It is still a light weight tablet and did not last more than 4 months. There are two charging ports and eventually both of them gave out making the tablet unusable.Spend a little more for a dependable longer lasting tablet. Avoid Allwinner, Zeepad, TabNero,Chromo, Tagital, Matricom and ZTO. They are all the same tablet under different names.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: so cute!!
Reviews.Author: C. Watts "PR lover"
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my daughter... its perfect!! almost all her games were free i was able to lock the play store from unexpected purchases.. only downfall which isnt the companys fault is locking the setting feature!!

Reviews.Title: from Michigan
Reviews.Author: nancy weeks
Reviews.Content: bought this for grand kids ages 4&5 they can navigete them well and love them, they love to play games on their tablets.

Reviews.Title: Not worth $2.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sand kraft"
Reviews.Content: Takes about 1/2 hour to do anything. Has good specs bit no performance.More words just prolongs agony. Gave this to my grand daughter and these are her words.

Reviews.Title: not too bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Hannah Brush
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad is a good value for the price. I wish the construction was a little more durable, the plastic seems too thin. It does offer several apps and gadgets, ect.. My daughter enjoys watching netflixs, and PBS Kids. She also likes to skype with her grandma that lives in New Zealand.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: maggie
